document_data.name: Mattock
document_data.mainbody: A '''mattock''' was used primarily as a tool for digging although it could be used as a weapon.  The head of a mattock was a combination of a [[pick]] and an adze.

Variants.Hand tock: Small mattocks with short handles. Were common around [[Delzimmer]], where adolescents used them to harvest [[braskh]] roots.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|49-50}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 41: Delzemaeran Delicacies, Part 3}}

Notable Owners of Mattocks.Individuals: * The [[goliath]] warrior [[Tobin]] used a huge mattock as his primary weapon.
Notable Owners of Mattocks.Religions: * [[Dumathoin]] owned a great, two-handed mattock with a ''[[item enchantment|+5 enchantment]]'' that was made of solidified magma.
